BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
Comment: Overflow Room for additional public viewing at 250 Broadway.

Items.Title: Application number 20215027 HAK (TBK1002-Riseboro UDAAP and Article XI) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 577 of Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law for approval of an urban development action area project, waiver of the area designation requirement, waiver of the requirements of Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, and approval of a real property tax exemption for property located at 135 Menahan Street (Block 3306, Lot 53), Community District 4, Council District 37.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, TBK1002-Riseboro UDAAP and Article XI, Brooklyn (20215027 HAK)
